mapper.select: SELECT a.id as goods_id , a.name , a.cash_unit , a.coin_unit , a.base_unit , b.id as invest_id , b.user_id , c.init_cash , c.equity , c.returns , if (c.returns > 0, round(c.returns / 49, 2), 0) as payment_price , if (c.returns <= 0, 'OK', null) as status FROM goods a JOIN invest_goods b on a.id = b.goods_id JOIN performance_summary c on b.id = c.invest_id WHERE b.is_paper = false AND date_format(concat(a.invest_end, '05', '00','00'), '%Y%m%d%H%I%S') > date_format(convert_tz(now(), @@session.time_zone, '${standardOffset}'), '%Y%m%d%H%I%S')

mapper.update: UPDATE invoice SET status = 'DELAY' WHERE date_format(create_time, '%Y%m%d%H') < date_format(convert_tz(now(), @@session.time_zone, '${standardOffset}'), '%Y%m%d%H') AND status is null
mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.create_time , a.invest_id , a.status , a.init_cash , a.payment_time , a.payment_price , a.returns , b.user_id , c.name , c.id as goods_id , c.cash_unit FROM invoice a JOIN invest_goods b on a.invest_id = b.id JOIN goods c on b.goods_id = c.id WHERE b.is_paper = false AND b.user_id = #{param1} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
